name: Disarmed (btthl)
description:
What kind of knight loses their sword in a duel? At least you still have your shield. Block when your opponent swings, and don't block when they kick.

Controls:

  • Left Click or Space to block

Credits:

  • Music: https://nicole-lyria.itch.io/medieval-rpg-themes
  • SFX: https://danielsoundsgood.itch.io/free-deadly-kombat-sound-effects
  • Font: https://ggbot.itch.io/kaph-font
